Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe holds immense value for someone like yourself. This product has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality, making it worth more than $1,000,000 to its owner. It comes equipped with cutting-edge features that cater to your unique needs and preferences, ensuring unparalleled performance and satisfaction.

Considering the exceptional nature of this product, I am extending a special offer to you. If you choose to make this product yours, you can do so at a price of $950,000. This represents an outstanding value, allowing you to experience all the benefits of the product while also securing a significant savings compared to its market value.

Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that you will find this product to be an invaluable addition to your collection or endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to me.

Looking forward to your positive response.

Best regards,
Alice 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
